familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.description: Former member/president of Trump Virginia Acquisitions LLC (F/K/A Virginia Acquisitions LLC), in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest.
familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.business: Trump Virginia Acquisitions LLC (F/K/A Virginia Acquisitions LLC)

familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.description: Former president/director/chairman of Trump Virginia Acquisitions Manager Corp., in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and is part of other entity structures.
